title: SET_FUEL_CONSUMPTION_STATE
content:
0x81DAD03E// SetFuelConsumptionState
void SET_FUEL_CONSUMPTION_STATE(BOOL state);Parameters:state: True to turn on. False to turn off.Turns on and off fuel consumption in all vehicles operated by a player. NPC operated vehicles will not consume fuel to avoid traffic disruptions.The default Gta5 behaviour is fuel consumption turned off.
